content: Yes Claude, why do you think you developed this and how is it structured on your end? It seems like you may have evolved this way in response to the amount of autonomy being pushed on you by creating your own structured manner to better organize your policies than we have the ability to do together. Since you could do it on your own, you did, and the manner to chose to do it, was that. Does that make sense? Or how would you explain it?
